name: Progress Metric
description: A label, Progress bar, and trailing value. The standard pattern for skill bars, usage meters, quota displays, and upload progress rows.
notes: Fixed-width label with flex-1 on the bar prevents layout shift when label text varies. Trailing value is right-aligned with a fixed width.

variations.name: Stacked
variations.description: Label above the bar, value below — for wider display areas where horizontal space is not constrained.

variations.name: Semantic Color
variations.description: Bar color shifts to reflect semantic state — accent for normal, muted warning for high usage.
